name: MystBuster lite
description:
Quick pull and play pop game, the goal is to reach the score goal in the allotted time limit, by collecting the red and blue orbs, while avoiding hitting the yellow orbs

Simple but Fun quick reaction game, excellent for killing time on the bus or in a waiting room.

avoid letting the red orbs hit the bottom or else score is depleted

avoid touching the yellow orbs or score will be depleted

content updates coming soon.
